comments:
Hi

Got an NPE when generating a webservice client. The wsdl file is attached and 
the stack is dumped below. Notice that the wsdl has been validated succesfully 
while emitting a warning (URI relative "XMLSchema.dtd"; ne peut ?tre r?solue 
sans URI de base.)

Created an attachment (id=24464)
Account.wsdl: the wsdl file used to generat the ws client
The problem is no longer reproducible in WTP 1.5 M6 driver.

As we are trying to close down WTP 1.5, please get the latest WTP 1.5 driver to verify the bug and reopen if the problem had not been fixed.  If this defect is not verified/reopened by end of day 06/16, I'll attempt to verify the defect by reproducing the problem as described in the defect.  However, since you know your scenario best, it would be more appropriate if you verify the fix.
